Raider's Crossroads

Here you'll be able to loot Giants' Codices! Also, the amounts of Silver Shilen dropped by the orcs are pretty good.



Raider's Prisons

There are some Prisons located around the Nerva's Crossroads, these prisons can be opened with the Nerva's Temporary Prison Key.
Inside the prison you can kill the Nerva Kaiser talking with Kaysen.
